description: This file defines a Webpack plugin class 'WebpackHealthPlugin' that tracks the compilation state and health metrics of Webpack builds, including errors, warnings, compile times, and overall health status.

classes.name: WebpackHealthPlugin
classes.description: A Webpack plugin class that monitors and reports on build health and status.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with default status metrics.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Sets up hooks into the Webpack compiler to track build lifecycle events.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current build status with additional computed health indicators.

methods.name: getSimpleStatus
methods.description: Provides a simplified view of the current build status.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the internal status metrics to initial state.
